articles.title: READ: Attorney General nominee Merrick Garland's opening statement to the Senate Judiciary Committee
articles.description: President Joe Biden's nominee for attorney general, Judge Merrick Garland, is scheduled to appear before the Senate Judiciary Committee on Monday and Tuesday for his confirmation hearing.

articles.title: What pandemic practices will Bill Gates stick to a year from now?
articles.description: As more and more Americans receive the Covid-19 vaccine, CNN's Anderson Cooper asks Bill Gates if, one year from now, he would be willing to sit inside at a restaurant or resume shaking hands with people.

articles.author: Lauren M. Johnson, CNN
articles.title: A zoo crocodile in Florida underwent surgery to remove a shoe from her stomach
articles.description: A Nile crocodile named Anuket had to undergo surgery in Florida recently.

articles.title: Did Pence feel betrayed after the riot? His former chief of staff responds
articles.description: CNN's Pamela Brown asks Marc Short, former Vice President Mike Pence's chief of staff, if Pence felt any betrayal by former President Donald Trump after the January 6th riot at the US Capitol.

articles.author: Tara John, CNN
articles.title: Why Britain's anti-immigration politicians are opening the doors to thousands of Hong Kongers
articles.description: The BN(O) scheme for Hong Kong nationals is remarkable in its scope as it's also remarkable for another reason: it has been pioneered by the same British politicians who engineered the UK's break from the European Union, in part, to curb immigration.

articles.author: Hollie Silverman and Alaa Elassar, CNN
articles.title: Three people killed, two injured, in shooting at gun store in Louisiana
articles.description: Three people were killed and two were injured in a shooting at a gun store in Louisiana on Saturday.

articles.title: 'Need to turn immediately': Hear the United Airlines pilot's mayday call
articles.description: CNN's Pamela Brown and Pete Muntean discuss the mayday call made by the United Airlines pilot after experiencing engine failure shortly after take off.

articles.title: 'Very shocking': Man receives energy bill for nearly $7,000
articles.description: CNN's Fredricka Whitfield speaks to DeAndre Upshaw, who is one of several Texas customers receiving sky-high energy bills as a result of the weather crisis throughout the state.
